rukus.text: 39|42|Alloh taolo conhoro dar lahzai marg megirad va[niz] coni kasero, ki namurdaast, ʙa hangomi xoʙas [megirad], on goh conhoero, ki hukmi marg ʙar onho rondaast, nigah medorad va coni digaronro ʙozpas mefiristad, to hangomi muajjan [marg]. Dar in [amr] ʙaroi har ki ʙiandesad, nisonahoe [az qijomat] ast

39|43|Ojo musrikon ƣajr az Alloh taolo [ʙaroi xud az mijoni ʙutho] safoatkunandagone intixoʙ kardaand? [Ej pajomʙar, ʙa onon] Bigu: «Hatto agar onho moliki cize naʙosand va [cizero] dark nakunand [ʙoz ham onhoro ʙa safoat metalaʙed]»
39|44|Bigu: «Safoat ʙa tamomi az oni Alloh taolo ast. Farmonravoii osmonho va zamin niz az oni Ust va nihojatan [hamagi] ʙa pesgohi U ʙozgardonda mesaved»

39|45|Hangome ki Alloh taolo ʙa jaktoi [va tavhid] jod mesavad, dilhoi kasone, ki ʙa oxirat imon nadorand, mutanaffir [va ʙezor] megardad. Va cun az ma'ʙudone ƣajr az Alloh taolo jod savad, on goh ast, ki musrikon sodmon megardand
39|46|Bigu: «Bor iloho, [ej] ofarinandai osmonho va zamin, ej donoi nihonu oskor, Tu dar mijoni ʙandagonat dar mavoridi ixtilofason dovari xohi kard»

39|47|Agar du ʙaroʙari on ci dar zamin ast, dar ixtijori sitamgoron [musrikon] ʙosad, hamaro ʙaroi nacoti xud az saxtii azoʙi ruzi qijomat fido mekunand [Vale paziruftani nest]. Va az coniʙi Alloh taolo umure ʙarojason oskor megardad, ki tasavvurasro ham namekardand
39|48|[Dar on ruz] Dastovardi zistason ʙar onon oskor mesavad va azoʙe, ki masxara mekardand, domangirason xohad sud

39|49|Har goh inson ducori [rancu] zijone savad, Moro [ʙa nijois] mexonad va cun az coniʙi xes ne'mate ʙa vaj arzoni dorem, megujad: "Faqat [lajoqat va] donoii xudam muciʙi in ne'mat sudaast. [Na] ʙalki in ozmois [-i ilohi] ast, vale ʙestari mardum namedonand
39|50|Pesinijonason ham hamin suxanro guftand, vale [ʙa hangomi azoʙ] dastovardason sude ʙa holason nadost
39|51|Va [uquʙati] dastovardi zistason domangirason sud. In sitamgoron [-i musrik] niz ʙa uquʙati dastovardason giriftor xohand sud va [Parvardigori mutaolro] ʙa tang naxohand ovard
39|52|Ojo musrikon namedonand, ki Alloh taolo [ne'mat va] ruziro ʙar har kase, ki ʙixohad, gusturda medorad va jo tang megirad? Be gumon, dar in amr ʙaroi mu'minon nisonahoe [az tadʙiri ilohi] ast
